title: 1990 Albanian Supercup
text:
The 1991 Albanian Supercup was the second edition of the <a href="Albanian%20Supercup">Albanian Supercup</a>, an annual Albanian <a href="association%20football">football</a> match. The match was contested by <a href="FK%20Dinamo%20Tirana">Dinamo Tirana</a>, champions of the <a href="1989%E2%80%9390%20Albanian%20Superliga">1989–90 Albanian Superliga</a> and <a href="1989%E2%80%9390%20Albanian%20Cup">1989–90 Albanian Cup</a>, and <a href="Flamurtari%20Vlor%C3%AB">Flamurtari Vlorë</a>, which was the runner-up in cup. It was held at the <a href="Qemal%20Stafa%20Stadium">Qemal Stafa Stadium</a> on 11 January 1991.
The regular and extra-time finished in a 3–3 draw, with Flamurtari's <a href="Sokol%20Kushta">Sokol Kushta</a> notably scoring a hat-trick. Dinamo Tirana then won on penalty shootouts.
